hackathon-description-text: Join us for a weekend of learning, collaboration, and inspiration. We are excited to bring together 300 hackers from all over the region alongside speakers and mentors from all over the nation - visit athenahacks.com for more information!
hackathon-rules:
AthenaHacks is dedicated to maintaining a safe and supportive environment for our hackers to explore, learn, and collaborate.
We expect all hackers to adhere to the 
.
Any violations will be taken very seriously.  If you at anytime see or experience something that makes you uncomfortable, contact an organizer right away!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon Echo's for each person on your team!
Parrot Mambo Drones for each person on your team!
Fitbit Flex 2's for each person on your team!
A Surface Pro 4 for everyone on your team!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Microsoft Technology Sponsored by Microsoft

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment! Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Members of the winning team receive Hack Harassment Battery Packs!
Google swag for everyone on your team!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best User Experience Sponsored by Google

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=651 W 35th St, Los Angeles, CA 90089, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is this a product that people will use in their daily lives? Will it make lives better?
How difficult was it to implement this project? Are there lots of APIs and libraries and languages involved? Did you use a really cool algorithm?
Is this project unique and innovative? Is it a solution to a problem we have never seen before? A better way of doing something?
Is your hack polished? Create a streamlined hack that looks as great as it functions!

hackathon-location-address: 651 W 35th St, Los Angeles, CA 90089, USA
hackathon-description-header: Empower girls in technology with Southern California's premier hackathon for women.
